sentence: Archer Daniels Midland CompanyADM is slated to report fourth-quarter 2015 results on Feb 2, before the opening bell.
In the last quarter, the company delivered a negative earnings surprise of 15.5%.
Let's see how things are shaping up for this announcement.
Archer Daniels has been in trouble for quite some time due to soft sales at most of its operating segments.
Market sources believe that the company's results are being impacted to an extent by the recent occurrences of farmer bankruptcies.
These sources attribute farmers' hardships to lower export sales and increased input costs for fertilizer and seeds.
Moreover, farmers' incomes continue to be affected by the fall in corn prices , which have declined nearly 50% in the past three years.
Also, Archer Daniels posted dismal third-quarter 2015 results, wherein both top and bottom lines declined year over year and fell short of expectations.
Further, the company delivered an average negative average surprise of 1.8% over the trailing four quarters, with consecutive negative surprises reported since the past two quarters.
Additionally, the company's financial performance may be affected by its significant presence in the international market which exposes it to unfavorable foreign currency translations.
Hence, we would prefer to wait and see what's in store for Archer Daniels in the quarter to be reported.
Our proven model does not conclusively show that Archer Daniels is likely to beat earnings this quarter.
This is because a stock needs to have both a positive Earnings ESP and a Zacks Rank #1, 2 or 3 for this to happen.

This is not the case here, as you will see below:

Zacks ESP: Earnings ESP for Archer Daniels is currently pegged at -19.18%.
This is because the Most Accurate estimate of 59 cents is below the Zacks Consensus Estimate of 73 cents.
Zacks Rank: Archer Daniels carries a Zacks Rank #4 (Sell).
We caution against stocks with a Zacks Rank #4 or 5 (Sell-rated) going into the earnings announcement, especially when the company is seeing negative estimate revisions.

Here are some companies you may want to consider as our model shows that these have the right combination of elements to post an earnings beat this quarter:

Lowe's Companies Inc. LOW has an Earnings ESP of +6.78% and a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy).
Dean Foods Company DF has an Earnings ESP of +5.88% and a Zacks Rank #3 (Hold).
Home Depot Inc. HD has an Earnings ESP of +0.91% and a Zacks Rank #3.
